info.name: chathost
info.description: These APIs handle the Well Dashboard and APIs from Well boxes to the Dashboard and Rocketchat.  Note that each API is either for the UI or SYNC.  Those that execute for the UI and handled with Basic Authentication with a Bearer Token for that session and the SYNC endpoints are Bearer Token.

request.description: If prior step was successful, this will now be true.

item.name: UI: Make sure we're logged out before beginning

request.description: Check to make sure that we are not authenticated.
Authenticate for test cases using postman account
If prior step was successful, this will now be true.
Provides an array of all the boxes managed on this Dashboard
Returns an array of courses for this box
Returns an array of logs for display in UI
Post a setting change that will affect the Well device after the Well can sync with the server.
Returns an array of pending settings that will be sent to the Well upon sync.
Send a delete message to server to delete a specific setting.  Use the deleteId in the path with corresponding boxid.

item.name: UI: Get Security Key For Box

request.description: Get the current security key that a Well can use to access the server

item.name: UI: Put Security Key For Box

request.description: Put a new security key into the server

item.name: UI: Get Security Key For Test Box
UI: Test Security Key For Test Box By Getting Empty Messages

request.description: This should fail.

item.name: UI: Delete Security Key For Box

request.description: Get the current security key that a Well can use to access the server

item.name: UI: Get Security Key For Box After Delete

request.description: Get the current security key that a Well can use to access the server

item.name: UI: Get Auth Confirm No Auth

request.description: Various logs may be sent from the Well to the server
Various logs may be sent from the Well to the server

item.name: SYNC: POST logs with JSON Error

request.description: Various logs may be sent from the Well to the server
Returns an array of settings that Well will act upon in array order.
Delete a setting using the deleteId in the GET
Returns a timestamp for retrieving messages.  The server will begin to compile the results in the background.
